document.full_text: a senior indonesian figure in al qaeda wanted in the 2002 bombing of a bali nightclub has been arrested in pakistan, intelligence sources in jakarta said tuesday.
document.title: asia: indonesia: bali bombing suspect arrested in pakistan
lines_and_colors: a senior indonesian figure in al qaeda wanted in the 2002 bombing of a bali nightclub has been arrested in pakistan, intelligence sources in jakarta said tuesday.
